Text: Annual Bus Pass NotificationAnnual passes for the month of October are ready for pickup at ECN

Re ECG Notice Cc Tana In regards to your question Yes you may send the card interoffice My room location is EB Attn Louis Allen Thanks Louis Allen DeShonda NRON PM To Louis CT cc Subject Re ECG Notice Forwarded by DeShonda HamiltonCorpEnron on PM From Tana CT on AM To Parking NRON cc Subject Re ECG Notice Can I send my old parking card back thru interoffice mail Parking NRON Sent by DeShonda NRON AM To Airam CT Natalie CT John CT David nronXGate Jeffrey C CT Ned nronXGate Nick CT Melissa nronXGate Tana CT David CT Jennifer CT Brad CT Fred CT Kimberly S CT Kevin CT John nronXGate Jeffrey nronXGate Sheri CT Larry nronXGate David NRON DeMonica nronXGate Lisa CT Patrice L CT George F nronXGate Martin nronXGate Jeanie nronXGate Kimberly CT cc Subject ECG Notice To all The new Enron Center Garage has opened and if those of you that have accepted spaces at the new garage would please return your Met and Allen Center parking cards ASAPso that we can back fill your spaces with others on the waiting list The Allen Center and Met cards will be deactivated immediately Please contact Parking and Transportation if you have any questions You may hand your old card to the security guard at the garage exit through the end of this week Thank you very much for your cooperation Louis Allen

Re Parking Pass for Van Ngo Cc Shirley CT AM To Louis nron cc Vince J CT Kevin G CT William NRON Subject Parking Pass for Van Ngo Good morning Louis Please cancel the Secom parking badge that was issued to Van Ngo for parking in the Clay garage while she was working part time with the Research Group during the holidays The number on the card is I will return the badge to you this morning The Co is and the RC is Thanks Louis and have a great day Shirley

Re Mark Taylor parking Cc Holly The reserved spaces at the Enron Center Garage have not been assigned I will make sure Mr Mark Taylors name is placed on the reserved waitlist Thanks Louis Allen Holly NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Louis CT cc Mark CT Subject Mark Taylor parking Louis I had sent a note to Steve Woods last week regarding this and have not received a reply back Mark E Taylor VP and General Counsel Enron North America had requested a reserved parking spot at the new Enron Center Parking Garage He currently parks at the Allen Center Garage Is it possible he could transfer to the new garage immediately Thank you Holly Keiser Enron Americas Legal Department EB ph fx
